channel.title: Christmas on Take Two
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on Take Two

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.description: Near the end of her life, one of my grandparents’ neighbors told this story: One day my grandpa came walking down the old railroad track that ran along the edge of his farm, just whistling away. This wasn’t unusual but the neighbor thought his whistle that morning sounded different, and went out to see why. When grandpa came to the corner, she asked, “Bill, why the happy tune?” He replied with a big smile, “I’m going to have a grandson (me)!
